para.text: Default IP address of the relay test kit is 192.168.1.123

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Set IP address of laptop as a same network segment, like: 192.168.1. xxx ;

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: (xxx can be 1~254, but must do not same as the last segment of the test kit IP address,in this example can not set as

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Subnet mask of laptop set as: 255.255.255.0

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Use Ethernet cable connect K3163i and laptop.

para.text: On the upper right corner of KRT Start page, will automatic show the connection status.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: If the IP of the laptop and the relay test kit is not in the same network segment, KRT software will show the IP of test kit, but unable to get connection, only in a continuous attempt to be online. The user needs to check the IP address of the local laptop and whether the system firewall has adopted a policy of running access to the network for KRT.
